description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nMega Spider Blast:
Your creatures start battles with 1 stack of {CONDNAME_MINION_SPIDERLING}. Your creatures' {CONDNAME_MINION_SPIDERLING} now also activate when their master deals damage, and the amount of damage done is now based on their highest stat instead of {STAT_health}. This trait does not stack.
name: Spider Silk Suit
